tool_description:
Imgur's API exposes the entire Imgur infrastructure via a standardized programmatic interface. Using Imgur's API, you can do just about anything you can do on imgur.com, while using your programming language of choice. If you're familiar with the APIs of Twitter, Amazon's S3, del.icio.us, or a host of other web services, you'll feel right at home.

The full documentation is available at: https://apidocs.imgur.com/
name: Imgur
title: Imgur

api_list.name: Account Creation
api_list.description: You must send recaptcha information with this request. Use this as the public captcha key: 6LeZbt4SAAAAAG2ccJykgGk_oAqjFgQ1y6daNz-H

required_parameters.name: recaptcha_challenge_field
required_parameters.description: Challenge field for the captcha

required_parameters.name: recaptcha_response_field
required_parameters.description: Response field for the captcha attempt

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: Username of the account

api_list.name: Account Send Message
api_list.description: Send a message to the user in the URL from the user that's currently logged in. Set the variables subject (the subject of the message) and body (the body of the message) accordingly. A user must be logged in to send a message to another user.

required_parameters.name: body
required_parameters.description: The text of the message. Similar to the body of an email.

optional_parameters.name: subject
optional_parameters.description: The subject of the message

optional_parameters.name: parent_id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the first message in the thread, by setting this, the message will be threaded to the given message.

api_list.name: Add Album Images
api_list.description: Takes parameter, ids[], as an array of ids to add to the album. Alternatively, the ids parameter can take a comma delimted string of ids. See below for examples. (Not available for anonymous albums. Adding images to an anonymous album is only available during image uploading.)

required_parameters.name: ids[]
required_parameters.description: IDs of images to be added to the album, can be sent as array with multiple images

api_list.name: Album Upload
api_list.description: This is how you upload an album

required_parameters.name: Description
required_parameters.description: The description of the album

optional_parameters.name: Title
optional_parameters.description: The title of the album

optional_parameters.name: privacy
optional_parameters.description: Sets the privacy level of the album. Values are : public | hidden | secret

optional_parameters.name: layout
optional_parameters.description: Sets the layout to display the album. Values are : blog | grid | horizontal | vertical

optional_parameters.name: cover
optional_parameters.description: The ID of an image that you want to be the cover of the album

optional_parameters.name: ids[]
optional_parameters.description: The images you want to include in the album

api_list.name: Comment Vote
api_list.description: Vote for a comment, :vote is up or down

required_parameters.name: vote
required_parameters.description: The {vote} variable can only be set as "up" or "down".

api_list.name: Gallery Comment Creation
api_list.description: Create a comment, the user must be logged in with OAuth 2 for this to work. Also, works for gallery albums if you replace 'image' with 'album' in the route

required_parameters.name: comment
required_parameters.description: The comment you want to create on image
required_parameters.default: So long, and thanks for all the fish.

api_list.name: Gallery Comment Reply
api_list.description: Reply to a comment in the gallery

required_parameters.name: comment
required_parameters.description: The reply to a comment

api_list.name: Gallery Image Vote
api_list.description: Vote for an image, {vote} is up or down (also works for Gallery Albums if you replace 'album' with 'image' in the route)

required_parameters.name: vote
required_parameters.description: 'up' or 'down'

api_list.name: Image Upload
api_list.description: Upload an image

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description: The binary data, a url string, or base64 data

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of image being uploaded : binary, url, base64

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: A title for the image

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: A description of the image

optional_parameters.name: album
optional_parameters.description: ID of the album to upload to

api_list.name: Report Comment
api_list.description: Report a comment for being vulgar

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the comment

api_list.name: Upload Image to Gallery
api_list.description: This allows a user to upload an image to the gallery, you're required to be logged in for this to work.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: This is the title that will be set in the gallery.

optional_parameters.name: terms
optional_parameters.description: If set to 1, the terms of the gallery are set.  This also allows you to by-pass our terms.  If you wish to set your own terms to upload the gallery there will be an error returned if they have not accepted the terms.

api_list.name: Send Verification E-mail
api_list.description: Sends an email to the user to verify that their email is valid to upload to gallery. Must be logged in as the user to send.

api_list.name: Album Update
api_list.description: Update the information of an album. For anonymous albums, {album} should be the deletehash that is returned at creation.

required_parameters.name: ids[]
required_parameters.description: The image ids that you want to be included in the album.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The title of the album

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: The description of an album

optional_parameters.name: privacy
optional_parameters.description: Sets the privacy level of the album. Values are : public | hidden | secret

optional_parameters.name: layout
optional_parameters.description: Sets the layout to display the album. Values are : blog | grid | horizontal | vertical

optional_parameters.name: cover
optional_parameters.description: The ID of an image that you want to be the cover of the album

api_list.name: Album Favorite
api_list.description: Favorite an album with a given ID. The user is required to be logged in to favorite the album.

api_list.name: Set Album Images
api_list.description: Sets the images for an album, removes all other images and only uses the images in this request. (Not available for anonymous albums.)

required_parameters.name: ids[]
required_parameters.description: The image ids that you want to be added to the album.

api_list.name: Reply Creation
api_list.description: Create a reply for the given comment.

required_parameters.name: image_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the image in the gallery that you wish to comment on

required_parameters.name: comment
required_parameters.description: The ID of the image in the gallery that you wish to comment on

api_list.name: Update Account Settings
api_list.description: Change the account settings

optional_parameters.name: bio
optional_parameters.description: The biography of the user, is displayed in the gallery profile page.

optional_parameters.name: accepted_gallery_terms
optional_parameters.description: true | false - The user agreement to the Imgur Gallery terms.

optional_parameters.name: username
optional_parameters.description: A valid Imgur username (between 4 and 63 alphanumeric characters)

optional_parameters.name: album_privacy
optional_parameters.description: public | hidden | secret - Sets the default privacy level of albums the users creates

optional_parameters.name: messaging_enabled
optional_parameters.description: true | false - Allows the user to enable / disable private messages

optional_parameters.name: public_images
optional_parameters.description: Set the users images to private or public by default

api_list.name: Custom Gallery Creation
api_list.description: Create a custom gallery

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name for the custom gallery.

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: Array of tags (e.g. 'cats,dogs')

api_list.name: Filtered Out Gallery Add
api_list.description: Filter out a tag

required_parameters.name: tag
required_parameters.description: Name of the tag to block.

api_list.name: Filtered Out Gallery Remove
api_list.description: Remove a filtered out tag

required_parameters.name: tag
required_parameters.description: Name of the tag to unblock.

api_list.name: Gallery Tag Voting
api_list.description: Vote for a tag, 'up' or 'down' vote. Send the same value again to undo a vote.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the gallery item

required_parameters.name: t_name
required_parameters.description: Name of the tag (implicitly created, if doesn't exist)

required_parameters.name: vote
required_parameters.description: 'up' or 'down'

api_list.name: Album / Image Reporting
api_list.description: Report an Image in the gallery

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the gallery item

api_list.name: Image Update
api_list.description: Updates the title or description of an image. You can only update an image you own and is associated with your account. For an anonymous image, {id} must be the image's deletehash.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The title of the image.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: The description of the image.

api_list.name: Block Sender
api_list.description: Block the user from sending messages to the user that is logged in.

api_list.name: Message Creation
api_list.description: Create a new message.

required_parameters.name: body
required_parameters.description: The message itself, similar to the body of an email.

required_parameters.name: recipient
required_parameters.description: The recipient username, this person will receive the message

api_list.name: Submit to Gallery
api_list.description: Add an Album or Image to the Gallery.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Gallery item ID

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The title of the image. This is required.

optional_parameters.name: terms
optional_parameters.description: If the user has not accepted our terms yet, this endpoint will return an error. To by-pass the terms in general simply set this value to 1.

api_list.name: Report Sender
api_list.description: Report a user for sending messages that are against the Terms of Service.

api_list.name: Image Favorite
api_list.description: Favorite an image with the given ID. The user is required to be logged in to favorite the image.
